title: Your appeal will be decided by an independent tribunal
reviewed_acronym: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your entitlement to the {{benefitType}} benefit.
separate: The tribunal are separate from DWP.
reviewed_UC: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision.
reviewed_non_acronym: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your entitlement to the {{benefitName}} benefit.
reviewed_contains_benefit: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your entitlement to the {{benefitName}}
